languages.text: "Я что рассказать-то хотел, про мятеж, значит... слухи ходили, что не просто так все это. Землетрясения эти, проблемы у красных ряс... Пророки у нас завелись странные, которые вроде как сами себе глаза выцарапывают и бормочут про Последний восход. Говорят, мол, конец этого мира близок, и кто не покается — тому его не пережить".

"So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."
languages.original_text: "Я что рассказать-то хотел, про мятеж, значит... слухи ходили, что не просто так все это. Землетрясения эти, проблемы у красных ряс... Пророки у нас завелись странные, которые вроде как сами себе глаза выцарапывают и бормочут про Последний восход. Говорят, мол, конец этого мира близок, и кто не покается — тому его не пережить".

traits.locale_text: "So about the rebellion — where was I — well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And those weird prophets came along. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of them — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you won't survive it, that sort of thing."

"So about the rebellion — where was I — well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And those weird prophets came along. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of them — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you won't survive it, that sort of thing."

No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you will be doomed, that sort of thing."

No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you will be doomed, that sort of thing."

"So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

"So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

languages.text: "Also, die Rebellion, wo war ich ... Na ja, es gab Gerüchte, dass das alles aus einem bestimmten Grund passiert. Die Erdbeben, die Probleme der roten Roben ... Und dann waren da diese merkwürdigen Propheten. Keine Augen ... haben sie sich wohl selbst ausgekratzt, wie es aussieht ... und sie haben ständig von der Letzten Dämmerung geredet. Ihr wisst schon, das Ende der Welt naht, tut Buße oder Ihr seid dem Untergang geweiht, solche Sachen."
languages.original_text: "So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

traits.locale_text: "Also, die Rebellion, wo war ich ... Na ja, es gab Gerüchte, dass das alles aus einem bestimmten Grund passiert. Die Erdbeben, die Probleme der roten Roben ... Und dann waren da diese merkwürdigen Propheten. Keine Augen ... haben sie sich wohl selbst ausgekratzt, wie es aussieht ... und sie haben ständig von der Letzten Dämmerung geredet. Ihr wisst schon, das Ende der Welt naht, tut Buße oder Ihr seid dem Untergang geweiht, solche Sachen."

languages.text: « Bon, revenons-en à cette révolte... Où en étais-je ?... Eh bien, selon différentes rumeurs, il y aurait une raison à toutes ces perturbations. Les tremblements de terre, les problèmes des robes rouges... Et puis, il y a eu ces prophètes bizarres. Ils n'avaient pas d'yeux, ils se les étaient arrachés eux-mêmes apparemment, et ils n'arrêtaient pas de parler de l'Aube finale. Vous savez, la fin du monde approche, repentez-vous ou vous êtes condamnés, ce genre de choses. »
languages.original_text: "So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

traits.locale_text: « Bon, revenons-en à cette révolte... Où en étais-je ?... Eh bien, selon différentes rumeurs, il y aurait une raison à toutes ces perturbations. Les tremblements de terre, les problèmes des robes rouges... Et puis, il y a eu ces prophètes bizarres. Ils n'avaient pas d'yeux, ils se les étaient arrachés eux-mêmes apparemment, et ils n'arrêtaient pas de parler de l'Aube finale. Vous savez, la fin du monde approche, repentez-vous ou vous êtes condamnés, ce genre de choses. »

languages.text: “所以说，关于这场叛乱，我……听传言说，这一切都是有原因的。先是地震，然后是那些红袍人造成的问题……接下来是那群古怪的先知。他们没有眼睛，看起来是自己把眼睛抠出来的，嘴里念叨着什么‘终末黎明’，还说什么‘末日即将到来，你要忏悔，否则你将难逃厄运’诸如此类的话。”
languages.original_text: "So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

traits.locale_text: “所以说，关于这场叛乱，我……听传言说，这一切都是有原因的。先是地震，然后是那些红袍人造成的问题……接下来是那群古怪的先知。他们没有眼睛，看起来是自己把眼睛抠出来的，嘴里念叨着什么‘终末黎明’，还说什么‘末日即将到来，你要忏悔，否则你将难逃厄运’诸如此类的话。”

languages.text: 「それで、反乱についてですが、どこまで話しましたっけ…まあ、何か理由があって起きたという噂がありました。地震、赤いローブの問題…そして、奇妙な預言者たち。目がなく、自分で引っ搔いたかのように見えました。そして、彼らは最後の夜明けについて語り続けました。世界の終わりが近づいている、悔い改めない限り、破滅の運命を辿ることになるだろうと、そのようなことを言っていました」
languages.original_text: "So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、反乱についてですが、どこまで話しましたっけ…まあ、何か理由があって起きたという噂がありました。地震、赤いローブの問題…そして、奇妙な預言者たち。目がなく、自分で引っ搔いたかのように見えました。そして、彼らは最後の夜明けについて語り続けました。世界の終わりが近づいている、悔い改めない限り、破滅の運命を辿ることになるだろうと、そのようなことを言っていました」

languages.text: «Sobre la rebelión... dónde estaba yo... bueno, había rumores de que todo estaba ocurriendo por una razón. Los terremotos, los problemas de los túnicas rojas... Y luego estaban esos extraños profetas. Sin ojos, que se los arrancaron ellos mismos, por lo que parece, y siguieron hablando del Amanecer Final. Ya sabe, el fin del mundo está cerca, arrepiéntete o estarás condenado, ese tipo de cosas».
languages.original_text: "So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

traits.locale_text: «Sobre la rebelión... dónde estaba yo... bueno, había rumores de que todo estaba ocurriendo por una razón. Los terremotos, los problemas de los túnicas rojas... Y luego estaban esos extraños profetas. Sin ojos, que se los arrancaron ellos mismos, por lo que parece, y siguieron hablando del Amanecer Final. Ya sabe, el fin del mundo está cerca, arrepiéntete o estarás condenado, ese tipo de cosas».

languages.text: "Ee, şey, isyandan bahsediyorduk. Depremlerin, kırmızı cübbelilerin, kısacası her şeyin bir nedeni olduğu söylentileri yayılmıştı. Bir de tuhaf peygamberler çıkmıştı. Gözleri yoktu, kendileri oymuştu belli ki ve Nihai Şafak hakkında konuşup duruyorlardı. Dünyanın sonu geldi, tövbe edin yoksa mahvolursunuz tarzı şeyler işte."
languages.original_text: "So, about the rebellion — where was I... well, there were rumours that it was all happening for a reason. The earthquakes, the red robes' problems... And then there were those weird prophets. No eyes — scratched them out themselves, by the looks of it — and they kept going on about the Final Dawn. You know, the end of the world is near, repent or you'll be doomed, that sort of thing."

traits.locale_text: "Ee, şey, isyandan bahsediyorduk. Depremlerin, kırmızı cübbelilerin, kısacası her şeyin bir nedeni olduğu söylentileri yayılmıştı. Bir de tuhaf peygamberler çıkmıştı. Gözleri yoktu, kendileri oymuştu belli ki ve Nihai Şafak hakkında konuşup duruyorlardı. Dünyanın sonu geldi, tövbe edin yoksa mahvolursunuz tarzı şeyler işte."
